data.text:
@Vishalgoel_IN @LinkedIn @LinkedInHelp @AshwiniVaishnaw Same experience I had with my account of 2years, Send a message to @e_techsupport, they should be of support to you.
They helped rectify mine, I personally recommend them for support.

@Vishalgoel_IN Hi Vishal, we have updated your case with your comments. The team will be following up with you via email. Due to our strict privacy policies, we will not be able to discuss the matter of your account here. Thank you for understanding.~TS

@LinkedInHelp It was about highest suspension bridge in World and that Kuwati Guy said that "But Lets see". For Everyone's information Indian forces are well prepared to safeguard our assets and our nation. We are proud of our country.

@LinkedInHelp I have send my email address in private DM. Please review the matter and resolve as i only mentioned i views in response of other comments and my comments were not abusive or anything. Last comment was negative as that Kuwaiti guy meant in negative sense so i replied in that way
@Vishalgoel_IN Hi there, sorry to hear you account has been restricted. I'd be happy to help. Can you please send us your email address in a Private DM? -RM

They took this action as i am not a communist and i am an Indian. I expressed my views and china is responsible for the spread of Covid-19 in World and It is not in against of any law.
In latest comment Kuwaiti guy was looking at Chinab Rail Bridge in wrong way so i replied Him.
